io.blocko.coinstack.openkeychain.server

Class AuthorizationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.blocko.coinstack.openkeychain.server.ChallengeResponseManager
      • io.blocko.coinstack.openkeychain.server.AuthorizationManager

  • public class AuthorizationManager
extends ChallengeResponseManager
    Authentication checker that can verify client possession of a certificate and the validity of certificate through blockchain
